item.title: vRealize Automation 8.x - Services
item.description: vRA & Terraform: A New Way to Deploy – Gary Flynn - Jan 5, 2021 […] vRealize Automation Cloud is comprised of three services: Cloud Assembly, Service Broker and Code Stream. To understand these services more, have a read of this post. […]

item.title: vRealize Automation 8.x - Services
item.description: In the previous post we configured vRA 8.0 with a vSphere endpoint and in this post we are going to cover the different Services which are available. vRA 8.0 has four main components or services, Cloud Assembly, Service Broker, Code Stream and Orchestrator. Great, but what is the role of each service? Image not found a.warning-link { color: inherit !important; font-weight: inherit !important; text-decoration: underline !important; border-bottom: none !
